post.text: Together, we will bring the REAL CHANGE we've been waiting for!

comment.author: Autumn
comment.text: It would appear that he has been groomed his entire life for this role. Divine providence makes no mistakes. We may not like the form something good comes in (look at Samson), but it may be Gods plan nonetheless.

replies.author: Gabe
replies.text: So many people hate him and when he becomes President they are going to want him to fail but he won't

replies.author: Benjamin
replies.text: This is our last chance, Friend, Right now, Trump for President is airing hard-hitting, issues-based TV ads in key media markets, promoting Mr. Trump's plans to Make America Great Again while exposing the lobbyists, Crooked Hillary and all the other politicians who've made the system work only for them and against you. The American people are starving for this kind of message, and if enough people hear directly from Mr. Trump about his plans for the future, we're going to win on November 8. +2348138734922 whatsApp. Please send as many SMS to your friends!!!
